section.body: Not at all.

section.header: Question: There are things under my skin, what do I do?
section.body: Claw them out out out out out. Rip and tear and rip until all of them are gone and you will be safe again I promise.

section.header: Question: Why don’t they respect me?
section.body: Because they haven’t learned to fear you. They have grown weak and complacent.

section.header: Question: Why don’t they love me?
section.body: You are a worthless piece of shit and you don’t deserve love. Wallow in your uselessness.

section.header: Question: Will the pain stop?
section.body: No, of course not. You deserve the pain. Spread it and they will no its glory.

section.header: Question: Who deserves death first?
section.body: I ask myself that same question every day. I’ve finally figured it out.

section.header: Question: Why don’t the voices agree anymore?
section.body: There’s too many of them. Thin the herd and cull the scum, cleanse the words and all will be good again. Fuck them fuck them fuck them.

section.header: Question: Do they deserve it?
section.body: Of course they do.

section.header: Question: When will the barking stop?
section.body: You have to drown it out with their screams, or it never will.

section.header: Question: Why?
section.body: Fuck them fuck it fuck them they laugh and they don’t understand I need to make them understand fuck it.

section.header: Question: All work and no play?
section.body: Makes Jack a dull boy. All work and no play?Makes Jack a dull boy. All work and no play?Makes Jack a dull boy. All work and no play?Makes Jack a dull boy. All work and no play?Makes Jack a dull boy. All work and no play?Makes Jack a dull boy. All work and no play?Makes Jack a dull boy. All work and no play?Makes Jack a dull boy. All work and no play?Makes Jack a dull boy. All work and no play?Makes Jack a dull boy. All work and no play?Makes Jack a dull boy. All work and no play?Makes Jack a dull boy. All work and no play?Makes Jack a dull boy. All work and no play?Makes Jack a dull boy. All work and no play?Makes Jack a dull boy. All work and no play?Makes Jack a dull boy. All work and no play?Makes Jack a dull boy. All work and no play?Makes Jack a dull boy. All work and no play?Makes Jack a dull boy. All work and no play?Makes Jack a dull boy. All work and no play?

section.header: Question: Who is watching?
section.body: The queen, of course. We must please the queen, otherwise she’ll bring out the needles again. We don’t want the needles.

section.header: Question: Do they care?
section.body: No, of course not. Don’t assign the pigs feelings, they’re just weak, weak weak waiting for our knives.

section.header: Question: Where has the pain gone?
section.body: Into the others. Keep putting it where it belongs, it works good good good.

section.header: Question: Will we die?
section.body: Of course we will. We all will, by the end of this.

section.header: Question: Why am I smiling?
section.body: Because you need to smile. Smiles are good.

section.header: Question: Which one is the worst?
section.body: The first is always the worst. Hurt them good.

section.header: Question: Can they feel my heart?
section.body: [This entry has been sanitized for your protection.]

section.header: Question: HAHAHAHAHAHAHA?
section.body: 

section.header: Question: The messiah is dead.
section.body: I and also I will be your gods.

section.header: Question: Tell me.
section.body: I rotted little holes in all my flaws. Nothing will hurt me again.

section.header: Question: Did you forget I was here?
section.body: I am everything you never thought to fear. Scream.

section.header: Did you think I was tame?
section.body: lol.

section.header: Question: The dogs?
section.body: They’ve found a way in. Plug the entrances, or you will not be saved.

section.header: Question: How do I escape a murderous Mind player???
section.body: IF YOU THINK THAT YOU CAN RUN IF YOU THINK THAT YOU CAN STAND WELL YOU FORGET WHO TURNED THIS CITY ON YOU FORGET WHO PLUGGED THIS CITY IN!

section.header: Question: I think I'm going insane!
section.body: Don't worry, you're good.

section.header: Question: I've never felt so right before! Everything is so clear! I know what must be done.
section.body: You're insane! Get help NOW!
